entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
